resources.string: Entangle is a messaging app that allows you to take back your privacy while easily communicating with friends.

Using Entangle, you can communicate instantly while avoiding SMS fees, create groups so that you can chat in real time with all your friends at once, and share media or attachments all with complete privacy. The server never has access to any of your communication and never stores any of your data.
* Private. Entangle uses an advanced, quantum resistant, end to end encryption protocol that provides privacy for every message every time.

* Open Source. Entangle is Free and Open Source, enabling anyone to verify its security by auditing the code. Entangle is the only private messenger that uses open source peer-reviewed cryptographic protocols to keep your messages safe.

* Group Chat. Entangle allows you to create encrypted groups so you can have private conversations with all your friends at once. Not only are the messages encrypted, but the Entangle server never has access to any group metadata such as the membership list, group title, or group icon.
